alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Lawrence; Limestone (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 11:25PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lauderdale, northern Limestone and north central Lawrence Counties through 1215 AM CST... At 1125 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rogersville, or 19 miles west of Athens, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Athens, Rogersville, Courtland, Harvest, Elkmont, Anderson, Lester, Good Springs, Cartwright and Coxey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for north central Alabama.
